rules_text: When this side is cleared, add two mana in any combination of colors. You don't lose unspent mana as steps and phases end this turn.
rules_text2: Discard a card: Create an Aether token. [i](It's an enchantment with “Sacrifice two Aether: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
